channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Schneider Electric Software Update (SESU), all versions prior to V2.2.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Schneider Electric Software Update (SESU), all versions prior to V2.2.0

item.title: CVE-2018-7799|2024-08-05T06:37:59.240Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- schneider%20electric%20software%20update%20%28sesu%29%2C%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20v2.2.0
item.description: A DLL hijacking vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric Software Update (SESU), all versions prior to V2.2.0, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the targeted system when placing a specific DLL file.
